description.value:
Holy weapons command powerful celestial energy. A weapon with this rune deals an extra [[/r 1d6 # good]] good damage against evil targets. If you are evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command; Frequency once per day; Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon; Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.

rules.text: Holy: Activate R command; Frequency once per day; Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon; Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.
